source.95af25b9:
regions = values.keys()[0:10]
y = list(values)[0:10]

pbar = plt.bar(regions, y)
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.grid()
plt.xlabel("Loca_area")
plt.ylabel("Houses")
plt.title('Region with most Houses', fontweight = 'bold')
plt.show()
